other_tests.findings: Biopsy showed benign squamous mucosa with extensive submucosal fibrosis and mild chronic inflammation, with no tumor seen.
A lobulated, multiseptated, fleshy lesion was identified and removed piecemeal; frozen section was determined to be benign.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Final pathological analysis revealed a benign fibroepithelial polyp. No evidence of recurrent disease noted on 3-year follow-up.
